motto: Whatever is worth doing at all is worth doing well.
description: 言行当至诚，立世信为基。修合无人见，存心有天知。外不诈于人，内不欺于己。人生须信仰，终生要坚守。一诺千金价，万难不背弃。慎思而笃行，知行要统一。
风动长发，手扶佩剑，白马银鞍，天地肃杀，看一夜，流星飒沓。
motto: Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm!
Business makes a man as well as tries him
description: 总在不经意的年生，回首彼岸。纵然发现光景绵长。

motto: Wisdom in the mind is better than money in the hand.
description: 一盏明灯，一轮皓月，一间茅屋，一行代码。

motto: We are going to have the most simple life and the most distant dream, even if tomorrow freezing, it was a long way, and the horse is dead.
description: 昨天太近，明天太远，默默聆听那黑夜。晚风吻尽荷花叶，任我醉倒电脑前。

motto: A great ship asks for deep waters
hobby: I'm fond of reading and Playing chess, badminton and table tennis
description: 鼠标手，代码走，莫愁前路无知己，总有程序相伴。

motto: Everything has its time and that time must be watched.

description: 真正的江湖，不过是一轮明月挂九天，Coding在手，人行天涯。
motto: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving
